text:
Congress vice-president Rahul Gandhi on Friday hit back at Prime Minister Narendra Modi for launching a personal attack on him but not answering questions about the issues facing the nation.

Mr. Gandhi said Mr. Modi had made him listen to the quotes of his father Rajiv Gandhi and grand-mother Indira Gandhi instead of responding to his four questions.

With Assam due to hold elections, Mr. Gandhi also said the people of the State would send the BJP packing as in Bihar due to his [Mr Modi’s] “non-stop false promises.” Rahul said the Modi government had done nothing for Assam. — PTI
title: Modi silent on my questions: Rahul
